name: Medical and Health Check-ups
description: Your provider will collect basic health information such as weight, height and vital signs, including blood pressure, heart rate and temperature.

name: Health and Nutrition Advice
description: Choose foods with healthy fats, limit foods high in saturated fat, and avoid foods with trans fat.

name: Surgery
description: Surgery, branch of medicine that is concerned with the treatment of injuries, diseases, and other disorders by manual and instrumental means.

name: Emergency
description: An emergency is a situation that poses an immediate risk to health, life, property, or environment.

name: Counselling
description: Counselling is a talking therapy that involves a trained therapist listening to you and helping you find ways to deal with emotional issues.

name: Diagnosis and treatment
description: A health history, physical exam, and tests, such as blood tests, imaging tests, and biopsies, may be used to help make a diagnosis.
